title: C-01 Calibration/Correction Action Codes
description: Standardized codes for immediate Sovereign AGI GSEP Stage 7 actions (Calibration/Correction) based on D-03 feedback analysis. This minimizes latency between feedback ingestion and required system response.

code.description: Unique three-letter code indicating the specific action (e.g., RET for Retrain S-01, ROLL for Rollback M-02).

action_description.description: Human-readable description of the required correction action.
